verbs.description: Special Counsel Robert Mueller [V: is] turning up the head on former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort , filing a third superseding indictment ( one that replaces the previous indictment ) and adding new charges , along with his longtime Russian associate Konstantin Kilimnik . Kilimnik is , by virtually all accounts , an agent of Russian intelligence . The special counsel Robert Mueller …
